name: Event Horizon (LD47)
description:
Escape the gravity well of the black hole by slaying the beast within. Collect fuel from nearby asteroids to ensure you don't get dragged inside!

Controls:

Use A and D to rotate left and right
Use W to boost away from the black hole
Use S to boost towards it

Aim with the mouse, LMB to shoot

Event Horizon
A Ludum Dare 47 Entry

Programmed in Unity by:
@_theChief_
  
@BJRose

Art by:
@Sverdfisken
